statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT instrument_name, condition FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE condition = 'good';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE condition='Good' ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory WHERE usage='Musical' GROUP BY quantity HAVING quantity > 5;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE condition='Good' AND usage='Musical' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, condition FROM inventory WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%guitar%' ORDER BY instrument_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, price FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT session_date, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE price <= 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT therapist_name, instrument_name FROM therapy_sessions JOIN instruments ON therapy_sessions.instrument_id = instruments.instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'John' AND session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instrument_name, quantity, price FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_name;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE instrument_id IN (SELECT instrument_id FROM instruments WHERE price < 100);
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT session_date, location FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity, price FROM instruments WHERE price >= 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, location FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM instruments WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT therapist_name, location FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM sessions_inventory WHERE quantity > 5);
SELECT instrument_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM instruments GROUP BY instrument_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE brand='Brand Name';
SELECT type, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM instruments GROUP BY type;
SELECT name, brand FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, type, quantity FROM instruments WHERE type='guitar' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, name, brand, quantity FROM equipment WHERE brand='Sony' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, session_date, therapist, location FROM sessions WHERE therapist='John Doe' ORDER BY session_date DESC;

SELECT s.id, i.name, s.therapist, si.quantity FROM sessions s JOIN session_inventory si ON s.id = si.session_id JOIN instruments i ON i.id = si.inventory_id WHERE si.quantity > 5 ORDER BY si.quantity DESC;

SELECT e.id, s.session_date, e.name, e.quantity FROM equipment e JOIN session_inventory si ON e.id = si.inventory_id JOIN sessions s ON s.id = si.session_id WHERE s.location='Office' ORDER BY s.session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Instruments ORDER BY instrument_name ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity, price FROM Instruments WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM Therapists WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT client_name, age FROM Clients WHERE session_id IS NULL;
SELECT session_date, session_time, location FROM Sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Instruments ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM Instruments WHERE is_available = true ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT therapist_name, specialization, experience_years FROM Therapists WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY therapist_name
SELECT session_date, session_time, location FROM Sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT Clients.client_id, client_name, age, Sessions.session_date, Sessions.location FROM Clients JOIN Sessions ON Clients.session_id = Sessions.session_id
